attributes.action: Change how How the UK Elects its Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Change how The Uk Elects the Prime Minister, After a UK General Election, once the public has Voted and the Largest Partys Selected To Govern, The House of Commons Should then have a Separate Election of The Prime Minister, where he or she Can be Any Elected MP From Any party within the Houses of Commons

For Example have a Conservative Government Under a Labour PM

rejection.details: This woud be a matter for the House of Commons not for Government
